name: Friends and Allies Climbing Gym
description:
Howzit! 

At Friends and Allies, we are for the people. We are here for passionate outdoor enthusiasts. We are for you, the tender senders and the dirty doers. 

FA is a boulder gym facilitating a space for people to cultivate their climbing indoors so that they can grow and go outdoors.
address: 10 Naaf Street Strydompark, Randburg, Johannesburg

name: CityROCK Johannesburg
description: The gym boasts 2,000m² of high wall climbing; 124 top rope anchors; 9 automatic belay walls; 500m² of bouldering; a 300m² well stocked outdoor gear shop; a 100m² beautiful yoga studio; a cardio and strength training area; and a dedicated beginners’ climbing area for birthday parties, kids, and courses.
address: 46 4th Ave South, Fontainebleau (4th Ave runs parallel to Republic) Randburg

name: Hangtime Gym – Bellville
description:
Hangtime Gym Bellville Offers:
11-12m walls for top-rope and lead, with plenty of angles
Big buttress and roof section for harder climbing
Two world-class bouldering areas – a free-standing boulder and a competition wall – at 4.5m high with top-out on both
All the rental gear you’d need
Free belaying by our staff
A dedicated yoga studio
Functional fitness and training area
Introductory courses and coaching
Kids parties
Bachelor/ette parties
Corporate team-building
School term programs
Film and photography shoots
Gear sales
Drinks and snacks
Bathrooms and showers

name: CityROCK Cape Town
description:
Welcome to CityROCK Cape Town!

Climb | Gear | Yoga

Indoor climbing is a fun way of exercising in a safe and vibrant environment. Climbing is not about sitting on a treadmill for what feels like hours – each climb is different and will challenge you every time both physically and mentally.
Our climbing facilities include a large bouldering area (bouldering is climbing 3-4m high without a rope) and high walls for roped climbing.

We cater to many different audiences – from first-time kids to experienced outdoor climbers, and everyone in between.

CityROCK is more than just a climbing gym, it is where like-minded people meet and share their passion for climbing.

Our coffee shop area has a relaxed vibe and is the ideal place to meet friends, climbing partners and make plans for your next trip.  Free Wi-Fi makes it a great spot to interact through your social media network, while having coffee, chatting, or browsing through climbing magazines and route guides.

We also cater for children’s birthday parties and corporate events. We have a well-established yoga studio that caters for a variety of yoga styles, and we also offer various climbing training courses for kids and adults alike.

CityROCK is also the home of the finest specialist outdoor gear shop in the country. We stock a variety of top local and international brands and our friendly staff will be able to assist you in kitting up with the best gear for your next adventure.

We pride ourselves on service excellence and our staff is always available to assist in any way.

So why not give us a call or pop in and try it out, it’s always the right time to something new.

Facilities & Services:

A large top rope and lead climbing area with 158 Anchors & A large bouldering area
An in-house yoga studio.
Children’s parties
Corporate Team Building
Climbing Courses & Instruction Offered
Gear Rental
Gear Shop
Wifi
Coffee & Drinks
Toilets & Showers
address: 9 Milner Street, Paarden Eiland, Cape town

name: Southern Rock Climbing Centre
description: The Southern Rock Climbing Gym is KZN’s answer to training, buying gear and learning the ropes. There are routes of all difficulty levels to suit everyone. Our bouldering cave is over 4m high with an innovative wave design to give you a great angle to test your skills on. Or clamber up using ropes on the Tower of Power. We offer courses to suit all your needs, whether you are new to the sport and need to learn the basics or you are an old hand wanting to train hard. Check out our courses to see what will suit you. Also we offer monthly crag days to facilitate getting outdoors more often – join us! Easily accessible from M5, M19 or N3, Southern Rock could be your new favourite hang-out.
address: Unit 13, Four Towers, 5 Valley View Road, New Germany
details: The Southern Rock Climbing Gym is KZN’s answer to training, buying gear and learning the ropes. There are routes of all difficulty levels to suit everyone. name: The Barn Indoor Climbing Gym
description:
160 Square meters of climbing walls including a 8 meter roof, 80 square meters of bouldering cave, 1851 Grips, routes varying from 11′s to 27′s.

It is also Pretoria’s only climbing gym.

About the Barn

The Barn was reopened in February 2005 under new management.

It is a well established climbing gym in Mooiplaats and is well known for it’s great atmosphere as well as it’s range of climbers, from newbies to professionals. Many call it a home away from home due to the nature of the community. We have over 450m2 of climbing walls with both top-ropes and about 50 lead climbing as well as over 150m2 of bouldering wall in the upstairs cave that is suitable for beginner to advanced climbers. The routes are changed regularly to keep the gym interesting and fun.

Aside from all the walls we have to climb, we also have gear available to hire and a gear store to cater for all your climbing gear requirements. Our facilities are a great venue for Birthday parties and Corporate team building events, with personalized events hosted by our friendly and experienced staff.

We also offer personalized training for climbers wanting to learn or push their grades in a relaxed environment. Not only do we spend our time climbing, we also enjoy hosting a range of social events for our climbing community.
address: Plot 210, Korhaan Street Mooiplaats 183 Pretoria

name: Drifters Xtreme Sport
description:
Drifters Adventure Centre has outlets in Johannesburg & Cape Town and represents the pinnacle in terms of adventure product and expert advice. We stock some of the world’s leading adventure brands. Camping, Hiking, Rock climbing & Adventure pursuit specialist retailer. We are the leading technical gear specialists for all your outdoor gear needs for any adventure from the Drakensberg to the Himalayas, Cape to Cairo and anywhere in between. Our customers have stood on the seven summits, sailed the seven seas, run, biked, hiked and climbed to all points of the globe. Visit us to get kitted with all the top brands for your next great adventure out there.
Knives, multi tools, torches, sleeping bags, tents, telescopes, boots, shoes, clothing, backpacks, daypacks, travelpacks, gps and accessories are all carried in stock. Visit one of our stores and put us to the test.
address: Cape Quarter Lifestyle Village, 27 Somerset Road, Greenpoint, Cape Town

name: Montagu Climbing
description:
Montagu Climbing will give you expert instruction and guidance at every level, whether it is your first time climbing or you are already an accomplished climber.  Stockists of Beal, Black Diamond & La Sportiva climbing equipment.

Montagu’s rock walls offer a wide variety of high quality climbing opportunities at every level from beginner to expert.   The area has over 450 climbing routes which cater for climbers of all levels of experience.

Join us for a great day out and experience some of the best rock climbing in South Africa.
Montagu Rock Climbing is owned & operated by Justin Lawson, an experienced and accredited Guide.

Montagu Rock Climbing offers the following services:

2 hour beginners climbing
Half or Full Day Sport Climbing
Multi-Pitch Climbing on Cogmans Buttress
Rock Scrambling
Abseiling for Groups
Climbing Gear Rental
Kids Camps & Courses
Introduction to Outdoor Sport Climbing Courses
address: 8 Brown St, Montagu, 6720

name: Roc ‘n Rope
description:
Roc ‘n Rope Adventures is situated in Waterval Boven, Mpumalanga, South Africa (25°38’33.9″S 30°19’48.7″E). We offer guided rock climbing and abseiling adventures.  Roc ‘n Rope (led by Gustav Janse van Rensburg) is an accredited MDT service provider we also offer courses for those who are interested in becoming guides or just want some guidance getting into climbing and abseiling. Climbers can stay in the Climber’s Lodge which is a fully equipped backpacker-style lodge with 3 dorm rooms and 4 double rooms.

Services Offered
Guided Climbing & Abseiling
Climbing Courses
Gear Rental
Gear Sales
Accommodation Bookings
address: 53 Third Avenue, Waterval Boven

name: Orca Industries
description:
Orca offers a full range of world class climbing, hiking, camping, trail running and diving equipment.  Orca also rents out a variety of hiking and diving equipment such as back packs, wetsuits, cylinders
and basic snorkeling gear.  And they offer a wide range of PADI, CMAS and SASCA Certified training and diving courses.
Come visit our shop in Claremont, Southern Suburbs

Stockists of the following brands: La Sportiva, Black Diamond, First Ascent, Petzl, MSR, DMM, Buff, Capestorm, Osprey, Suunto, Coghlans, Platypus, Icebreakerm Leatherman, Gerber & more…
address: 3 Bowwood Road, Claremont

name: Vertical World – Climbing Shoe Resoler
description:
Vertical World only resole climbing shoes. “Our resole business is situated in Johannesburg – we bought the business in October 2010 from the previous owners of Rockfrog Resoles. Our dedicated and experienced resoling technician, OJ, is in charge of our resoling workshop.

Our Services and Prices

Our workshop is equipped to replace worn rands and/or worn soles on climbing shoes.

Turnaround Time

We typically provide a turnaround time of about 4 weeks, but in exceptional cases we can fast track a pair of shoes through the process.
address: 20 Pallinghurst Road Westcliff, 2193 Johannesburg
details:

name: Tamsin Hodgson Physiotherapy
description: Nicky Agenbag is a physiotherapist working at Tamsin Hodgson Physiotherapy in Gardens, Cape Town.  She is a climber and has a special interest in Sports Physiotherapy.
address: 4 Glynville Terrace, Gardens, Cape Town 8001, South Africa
details: Nicky Agenbag is a physiotherapist working at Tamsin Hodgson Physiotherapy in Gardens, Cape Town.  She is a climber and has a special interest in Sports Physiotherapy.

name: PhysioActive
description:
Physio Active is owned by Mandy Marsden and Francie Bührmann. Hayley Schuter joined Physio Active in December 2014. We are experienced and keep up to date with current trends by attending numerous physiotherapy courses by reputable local and international lecturers.

All our permanent physiotherapists have completed the OMT (Orthopaedic Manual Therapy) post graduate 1 year diploma through the South African Physiotherapy Society. Physiotherapists with this diploma are highly regarded by fellow physiotherapists. The diploma teaches excellent clinical reasoning, critical thinking skills and how to evaluate the quality of research correctly.

 

Francie Bührmann
B.Sc (Physiotherapy)
University of Stellenbosch 1995
OMT post graduate diploma 2002

Through her own involvement in a variety of sports (rock climbing, mountain biking, running, swimming, windsurfing) and observing both active and sedentary patients, Francie has developed a keen interest in movement and position analysis. She has sought courses over the years to improve her diagnostic skills and knowledge in movement-based rehabilitation. Her expertise in these areas allows her to offer insightful treatments, as well as specific, rehabilitative clinical pilates classes to suit the individual needs of her patients.
address: 4 Milner Road Tamboerskloof, Cape Town, 8001 South Africa
details:

name: Acrobranch Constantia
description: Perfectly perched in the Southern Suburbs, Acrobranch Cape Town offers both young and old an exciting day out and about under the African sun. Overcome your fears as you swing through the trees on one of our three action packed aerial courses. Each course is specifically designed to offer all visitors an exhilarating, yet challenging outdoor experience in the beautiful Constantia Nek forest- just 15 minutes away from Cape Town

name: Friends and Allies Climbing Gym
description:
Howzit! 

At Friends and Allies, we are for the people. We are here for passionate outdoor enthusiasts. We are for you, the tender senders and the dirty doers. 

FA is a boulder gym facilitating a space for people to cultivate their climbing indoors so that they can grow and go outdoors.
address: 10 Naaf Street Strydompark, Randburg, Johannesburg

name: Montagu Climbing
description:
Montagu Climbing will give you expert instruction and guidance at every level, whether it is your first time climbing or you are already an accomplished climber.  Stockists of Beal, Black Diamond & La Sportiva climbing equipment.

Montagu’s rock walls offer a wide variety of high quality climbing opportunities at every level from beginner to expert.   The area has over 450 climbing routes which cater for climbers of all levels of experience.

Join us for a great day out and experience some of the best rock climbing in South Africa.
Montagu Rock Climbing is owned & operated by Justin Lawson, an experienced and accredited Guide.

Montagu Rock Climbing offers the following services:

2 hour beginners climbing
Half or Full Day Sport Climbing
Multi-Pitch Climbing on Cogmans Buttress
Rock Scrambling
Abseiling for Groups
Climbing Gear Rental
Kids Camps & Courses
Introduction to Outdoor Sport Climbing Courses
address: 8 Brown St, Montagu, 6720

name: Roc ‘n Rope
description:
Roc ‘n Rope Adventures is situated in Waterval Boven, Mpumalanga, South Africa (25°38’33.9″S 30°19’48.7″E). We offer guided rock climbing and abseiling adventures.  Roc ‘n Rope (led by Gustav Janse van Rensburg) is an accredited MDT service provider we also offer courses for those who are interested in becoming guides or just want some guidance getting into climbing and abseiling. Climbers can stay in the Climber’s Lodge which is a fully equipped backpacker-style lodge with 3 dorm rooms and 4 double rooms.

Services Offered
Guided Climbing & Abseiling
Climbing Courses
Gear Rental
Gear Sales
Accommodation Bookings
address: 53 Third Avenue, Waterval Boven
